name: The Game of Life / Yahtzee / Payday
summary: Yahtzee / Payday / Life is a compilation of great board games that many of us played when we were young Every now and then you might still break it out for old times sake Well now its easier than ever -- theyve been shrunk down and fitted into your Game Boy Advance See if you can become a millionaire in the Game Of Life get the highest rolls in Yahtzee or see if you can earn big bucks in Payday
